story-moment.THE BOOK KEEPER: After The Ancient One welcomed Stephen Strange as a student at the Kamar-Taj, the stern and unflinching master aided Strange as an instructor in his studies.
story-moment.FORBIDDEN BOOKS: When Strange overstepped and tested a spell from the forbidden books, Wong and Master Mordo, cautious of his quick advancements, reprimanded him for breaking natural law.
story-moment.DEFENDING HONG KONG: With the Wand of Watoomb, Wong defended the Hong Kong Sanctum.
story-moment.THE INFINITY STONES: Wong revealed the history of the Infinity Stones—how the Big Bang created six stones containing the universe’s elemental energies: time, power, reality, soul, space and mind.
story-moment.FIGHTING CULL OBSIDIAN: Standing alongside Doctor Strange, Iron Man, Bruce Banner, and eventually Spider-Man, Wong protected downtown Manhattan from Earth’s intruders, Cull Obsidian and Ebony Maw.

powers+abilities.MASTER OF SORCERY: Wong is one of the most knowledgeable masters in Kamar-Taj possessing a powerful mastery of sorcery.
powers+abilities.ELDRITCH MAGIC: Like all Masters of the Mystic Arts, he is able to shape and manipulate Eldritch Magic, invoking weapons and other objects via spells, cast illusions, and astral projection.
powers+abilities.SLING RING: With the Sling Ring, Wong is able to open up portals and travel across multiple dimensions of the Multiverse.
powers+abilities.WAND OF WATOOMB: Wong’s weapon of choice is the Wand of Watoomb, an artifact that allows him to block mystical attacks and unleash energy blasts.
powers+abilities.MASTER OF MARTIAL ARTS: Wong is a master martial artist, able to protect the Sanctums and other dimensions from the likes of the Zealots and Thanos’ followers.
